title: Miss fortune update - curse or bounty?
body:
So I've noticed MF not making as much air time and very seldom making the adc "tier lists".

VU looks great and long overdue.

The impure shots will become more predictable, which is good, but the bounce radius has narrowed.

Overall the slows max out at a lower level but give a bit more early game presence.

What do you think? Will we be seeing more of the salty siren or less?

replies.body: her q is broken, will probs be nerfed soon but probs not alot of people will play after they intially try her out, more or less stayed the same champion with a few tweaks

more. People want to try it.

in the words of nasus taunt spam DERDERDDDEDERDERDERDERDERDER (DER)
